sen.j: 六角通（ろっかくどおり）は京都市内の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Rokkaku-dori Street is an east-west running street of Kyoto City.
The Rokkaku-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.
The Rokkaku-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 東は西木屋町通から西は佐井西通西入ルまで。
sen.e: It runs from the Nishi Kiyamachi-dori Street in the east to Sainishi-dori nishi iru in the west.
It runs from Nishi Kiyamachi-dori Street in the east to Sainishi-dori nishi iru in the west.
It runs from Nishi Kiyamachi-dori Street in the east to Nishi-iru, Sainishi-dori Street in the west.
sen.cmt: 「佐井西通西入ル」の表記を修正 (佐井西通はKiyamachi-dori Streetに合わせ、Sainishi-dori Streetとしました。)

sen.j: 途中で坊城通・後院通との五叉路から朱雀中学校の北まではJR山陰本線などにより分断されている。
sen.e: It is interrupted by the JR Sanin Line and others from the crossing of five-forked roads with the Bojo-dori Street and the Koin-dori Street to the northern edge of Suzaku Junior High School.

The street is brroken up by the JR Sanin Line and five other forked roads which intersect with Bojo-dori Street and Koin-dori Street until the street reaches the northern edge of Suzaku Junior High School.

The street is brroken up by the JR Sanin Main Line and five other forked roads which intersect with Bojo-dori Street and Koin-dori Street until the street reaches the northern edge of Suzaku Junior High School.
sen.cmt: 原文の「山陰本線」に合わせ、"Sanin Main Line"としました。

sen.j: 平安京の六角小路にあたる。
sen.e: It corresponds to the Rokkakukoji of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to Rokkakukoji of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to Rokkakukoji of Heiankyo.

sen.j: 通りの名前は東洞院通と烏丸通の間にある頂法寺の六角堂に由来する。
sen.e: The name of the street comes from Rokkakudo of Choho-ji Temple located between the Higashinotoin-dori Street and the Karasuma-dori Street.
The name of the street comes from Rokkakudo of Choho-ji Temple located between Higashinotoin-dori Street and Karasuma-dori Street.
The name of the street comes from Rokkakudo of Choho-ji Temple located between Higashinotoin-dori Street and Karasuma-dori Street.

sen.j: 河原町通から寺町通までが路上喫煙等禁止区域である。
sen.e: The street between the Kawaramachi-dori Street and the Teramachi-dori Street is a Public Nonsmoking Area.
The street between Kawaramachi-dori Street and Teramachi-dori Street is a public nonsmoking area.
The street between Kawaramachi-dori Street and Teramachi-dori Street is a public nonsmoking area.
